HERO_TAGLINE: सोचको उडान: Building bridges, one story at a time
HERO_TITLE: सोचको उडान: Inspiring the Nepali Diaspora
HERO_SUBTITLE: Join meaningful conversations, tools, and projects centered on the journeys of the Nepali diaspora.
ABOUT_PARAGRAPH_MAIN:
I first came to the United States to study Biomedical Engineering, carrying a backpack, a few dreams, and a deep love for Nepal.

Today, I work as a biomedical engineer and quality professional, but my compass still points home.

सोचको उडान is my way of holding both worlds at once; it amplifies the voices of the Nepali diaspora, shares practical knowledge for students and professionals, and slowly builds projects that return care, dignity, and opportunity back to communities in Nepal.
PROJECTS_SECTION_SUBTEXT: A collection of stories, tools, and projects in care for the Nepali diaspora and communities back home.
PODCAST_BODY: Join us in listening to the journeys of the Nepali diaspora in the United States and beyond. From humble beginnings to soaring heights, these individuals have faced uncertainty, rebuilt themselves, and achieved remarkable things. Their stories are a testament to the resilience and quiet courage of Nepali people everywhere.
APP_BODY: Our team is designing a mobile application that makes booking hospital appointments in Nepal simpler and more transparent; this will help people access care more easily, even from remote locations.
WASH_TITLE: Solar Powered WASH & Menstrual Hygiene Hub
WASH_BODY: A school based water and hygiene hub for Nepal: clean drinking water, safe menstrual products, and dignified restrooms designed with girls at the centre. Built in partnership with local schools, engineers, and community leaders.
